name: hierarchy_brick
description: Hierarchy brick provides couple of transformations from adjacency list to other types of hierarchy representation that are useful in GD.

parameters.name: input_source
parameters.description: Input data source providing data to the brick.

parameters.name: output_source
parameters.description: Output data will be serialized locally into the file provided.

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: Configuration of columns. See documentation for more details.

parameters.name: hierarchy_type
parameters.description: A type of processing 'subordinates_closure_tuples', 'subordinates_closure' and 'fixed_level' is currently supported.
